Dear Frhuaren, 
	Today, more than any other day, I wished you were near me. I wish you could be there to comfort me like you always do. Today I could really use it. 
	A tragedy occurred. While one Hekalis was being prepared for the Zorik Vamo-Rlin, something went wrong. It suddenly became extremely aggressive, attacking everyone around it. I don't know how I survived. The fire beam coming from its eye almost touched me. I could feel the heat building up as the fire sliced right past me. The Hekaler next to me was less lucky, as the beam went through their arm like butter. I don't think they even realized what just happened until a few minutes later....

The Hekalis seemed to target whoever was nearest. 
	It hit another one with a full swing of an arm, sending them flying to the other side of the trial ground. The body was stuck to the wall, and they had to push it out with metal bars to recover it. 
	But the most horrible part was when it just crushed another Hekaler with its leg as it was walking between us. It walks so slowly; its legs take quite a long time before fully reaching the ground. I still remember the horrifying screams as the leg slowly compressed over this poor soul. Not the sound it made when the rest of the foot touched the ground. I think I won't give you more details. They told us we could have a rest, one week at most. I'm afraid it's not long enough for me to travel back home. I miss you immensely.

Seek Knowledge, Mind Your Steps, Judge With Compassion
If This is our Creed, then let it apply for the generations to come! 
Refuse that we would make them believe in the Khemenet!

Seek Knowledge, Mind Your Steps, Judge With Compassion
If This is our Creed, then let it apply for the generations to come! 
Refuse that we would make them believe in the Khemenet!

Would you want your children do believe in the Khemenet? 
Of course not! We refuse those lies to be passed on.
We believe in Reality!
The Realists Pamphlet - Fooled By The Khemenet

The budget spent on creating lies should be redirected towards the protection of our planet. 
We believe the next generations will not be fooled by the Khemenet! 
We believe in Reality!

Structure Integrity Yearly Report - Syndanex Co. - 5245 AA - 3/3
	Our recommendation is to create non-infused support structures containing a self-dismantling Sindano procedure. 
	While the procedure will be in a state of dormancy for most of the time, we have the know-how on timer coroutines that should allow for an automated setup at the right time. 
	Our company provided an estimated invoice and budget attached to the report. We will remain available for further negotiation.

Syndanex - PMN Level 3 Maintenance Operating Training Manual
1.15a Emergency Power Convergence Mainframe Shutdown
	USE CASE
1. Hádlezha Combustion in any submodule 
2. Personnel exposure to the Sindano Core Rod 
3. Exhaustion Chamber Misalignment detected during the firing phase 
	PRELIMINARY WARNINGS 
	This procedure bypasses 2 structural safety checks and creates an excessive load on the main and secondary support Zankaalrek structures.

ABSOLUTE care must be taken when performing this emergency shutdown, as any malfunction in the inner Hádlezha networks of the support structure could potentially lead to the destruction of the whole PMN structure.    
	This conception flaw was identified much too late in the construction; there is unfortunately no workaround. Therefore, before entering the Core Chamber, ensure that the readings on the network probes are nominal. If it isn't the case, performing this procedure is strongly discouraged and must be done only in cases of absolute necessity.

Syndanex - PMN Level 3 Maintenance Operating Training Manual
1.15a Emergency Power Convergence Mainframe Shutdown
	REQUIRED TOOLS & PERSONNEL
	Three Sorcetechs Specialists are required for the operation for optimal execution; however, the procedure can be achieved by a single person over more time. Since this is meant as an emergency procedure, it is recommended to be fully manned for an optimal result. 
	The Sorcetechs Specialist will need: 
- Kondalarim Imbuing Toolings
- Zankalarim Imbuing Toolings
- Vayularim Imbuing Toolings
	These tools are required for the flashing of all the submodules. Please refer to the module's reference sheets to know how they should be flashed.

Syndanex - PMN Level 3 Maintenance Operating Training Manual
1.15a Emergency Power Convergence Mainframe Shutdown
	PROCEDURE
	In order to perform the shutdown, three modules must be flashed in the correct order. The order is crucial for the shutdown to succeed. Not following the right order would result in the shutdown being cancelled. 
- Flash the Laminar Accelerator Module
- Flash the Impulse-Collapse Chamber Module

- Flash the Plasmatic Superposition Distributor Module
	Once the flashing has been performed, the main Accelerator should shut down, with its characteristic sound (see Training Manual Level 1-1.5). 
	The Convergence Core Rod will be safe to interact with within a few seconds only. However, due to potential Condensator malfunctions, please ensure that at least two minutes have passed before attempting any Rod removal procedures.

Syndanex - Incident Report A56 - 11.23 B.A. 
Time of the Incident: 5u23 
Type of Incident: Fatal Injury Of An Operator 
Cause Of The Incident: To Be Determined - Suspected unauthorized usage of manual imbuing on a fuse

Description Of The Incident: 
	The incident was only reported by eye witnesses so far. Vhalkenterák Memory Control Imprinters are being solidified as this is being reported for more insight on the incident.
	The eyewitnesses report that Operator Frhuaren Fhrandkra tried to manually imbue the fuses of the Plasmatic Superposition Distributor instead of using their imbuing tool, most likely as a way to bypass the safety protocols.

They reportedly mixed up the imbue required and imbued correctly the first fuse with Vayularim and the second with Zankalarim, but instead of Zankalarim once again for the third, they unfortunately used Vayularim. This created a Gravitational Plasmatic Shockwave that ripped their body into three parts on the thorax and on the neck.

Due to the plasmatic nature of the shock-wave, the wounds were instantly burned and closed, making it impossible for any medical operation to be performed in order to reassemble their body. A large portion of their blood also boiled during the process, which burnt their body beyond recognition. The Sorcetechs operators present at the time of the incident are in a state of shock and are currently hospitalized for severe traumatic stress.

There is nothing realistic in the approach of 'The Realists'. 
	It is a dark time for Dalgarian society. After millennia of coordinated, organized, and reasoned decision-making benefiting not only all Dalgarians but even the survival of the entire planet, an organization claiming to represent 'Realism' has appeared. They claim that our approach for the survival of all – one that was carefully crafted, financed, and approved by society – is destined for failure.

The Dalgarian Society Was Built On Trust 
	I will not need to use personal attacks, nor threats to defend what I want to defend. Our society was built on trust, and our society survives thanks to trust. 
	Thinking that the very trust that drives us would be absent from our children, thinking that there is inherently something special about us now that wouldn't be present in our future, is thinking our importance is much greater than it really is.

texts.id: Dalgarian - Tavheda Ghalendo Right Of Reply_1
texts.text: We built ourselves, and I trust our future is as bright as our present is. I believe that feeding our children with made-up beliefs, invented prophecies, and grand meanings behind every corner is feeding our children with lies. And I believe that every lie is eventually discovered. When your own children discover you lied to them, they will never believe you ever again.

texts.id: Dalgarian - Tavheda Ghalendo Right Of Reply_2
texts.text:
I believe our children are smarter than that. And I vow to burn all the stories meant to deceive them and to repeat to them, and to everyone else until it will become just a story like any other. 
	No, the Khemenet never existed! No, there is no such thing as the Mayak Naa or the Layak Naa! Those are stories that belong in a theatre; a place in which Lomeshi Kawenjala excels far more than in the fabrication of a large-scale propaganda machine!

Neo Mystical Collective 
Invoice #26 - To Be Paid Within 30 days 

Chants: 5 Total: 3450 DU 
- The Rebirth Of The Khemenet 
- Layak Naa and Mayak Naa Invocations 
- Chants of the Aminira Nar Kayosvam 
- Rest For Your Zorik Vamo-Rlin Lullaby 
- Hekalis Preparation Vocalizations

Inscriptions: 8 Total: 6400 DU 
- Hekalis Welcoming Inscription
- Hekalis Victory Engravings 
- Hekalis Crystal Selection Prayers 
- Gate of the PMN Welcoming Prayers 
- Light Ornamental Mantra 
- Gate MPD Words Of Wisdom 1 
- Gate MPD Words Of Wisdom 2 
- Gate MPD Words Of Wisdom 3

Total Cost: 9850 DU

Talshi, 
	The Neo Mystical Collective still hasn't been paid for their last invoice. Writing the prophecy of the Khemenet employs 10 writer full time, we cannot afford payments to be late. 
	We will need to apply a higher hourly rate if the payments continue to be late. With the level of budget the Science Councils receives, I hope we will find a swift solution for this issue. 
Best Regards, 
Lomeshi Kawenjala

Talshi, 
	I have an important request concerning the Khemenet quest. I found a way to incentivise the vessel candidates to hold the PMN convergence rod and begin the extraction process. However, this would require us to decorate or transform the convergence rod into a sword, a mystical, powerful and legendary weapon we would refer to in our texts. 
	Is this something that can be done? I believe it is critical for us to ensure the convergence rod is perceived as a tool to be obtained in order to remove any suspicions from the potential vessels should they enter the PMN Core Chamber. 
	Let me know what you think of this. 
Lomeshi
An Interview With Talshi - Reason For The Khemenet

- What would you say is the core reason for the Khemenet project to exist in the first place?
	I believe it is naive to put trust in the goodwill of humanity. I believe we are easy to corrupt, and I believe power will change anyone. I also believe that those who seek power are easy to lure. 
	Any individual able to manipulate Sorcery well enough will soon find themselves seeking more and more power—if they did not receive proper training. We are all well aware of how long and difficult our Sorcery training is, and I do not believe this will hold forever. 
	Luring powerful Sorcerers into believing a prophecy in which they are the most powerful being and are set on a great destiny is the best way to make them do exactly what you need from them.
An Interview With Talshi - A Cynical Approach

- Isn't your approach cynical? Many believe our outlook on the future to be too negative.
	It is a safe approach. One that considers the worst scenarios for the benefit of humanity. 
	I admire the candidates that proposed themselves as Vessels for the PMN. The sheer will and dedication that they displayed is beyond impressive. If our society allowed such brilliant souls to exist, we must reflect on the effort that was necessary to get there. 
	I believe our future is dark, and I believe this is safe, rather than cynical. It ensures that nothing could go wrong, nothing... 
	Besides, I find it fitting to let a corrupted mind sacrifice themselves unknowingly. I abhor those who seek power for the sake of power.

- If nothing was made to prevent Kayosva from influencing our planet when our orbit brings us closer again, what would happen? 
	We do not have many traces of the first apocalypse, more than 10 thousands of years ago. However, our geologists and physicists can inform us with a surprising precision on what would happen.

Kayosva is a preon star; a very rare and unique type of neutron star. We do not fully understand the way it influences our planet, but we know this: Our planet's core and a large part of its secondary layer consists of prismatic crystals; pure vector of energy. 
	The phenomenons we colloquially refer to as Sorcery directly emanate from the relation between those crystals and Kayosva. The closer we get to it, the more intense this relation becomes.

When the distance is at its closest, the energy build-up in the crystals can no longer be contained, leading to extreme cataclysmic reactions on the surface of the planet. We are talking about entire continents being burnt down. We are talking about meteorological effects beyond our comprehension. 
	Our only way to survive this is to exhaust all the excess energy out of our planet. That is what the PMN is here for, and so far we do not have any alternative. Losing the PMN does not offer any bright future for humanity.
The Realists Pamphlet- PMN or Nar Kayosvam

PMN or Nar Kayosvam?
	 We all know which one is an invention.
Hiding the truth from future generations will do no good.

They do so without bringing any reason, any study, or any logic to support this. They say our approach is manipulative, but they use propaganda; they are the ones who seek to manipulate the minds of our society! 
	Yes, the Khemenet is our invention, but it is the only choice we have. Yes, it does not explain the truth to future generations. But it is our only way to protect our planet.

General Geratan, 
	The Dalgarian Preservation Society reported that they lost their archaeologist who was on a mission in the ruins. 
	Find her, and investigate the disappearance. Without her research on Sorcery containment machineries, I fear our Kingdom will soon find itself in even greater danger against the rising Corruption.

As such, finding her and her research must be your absolute priority. 
	Additionally, my spies have reported the presence the Wildfolk in the vicinity. This corrupted cult is encroaching on our land, and must be stopped at all cost. 
	If you find them in the ruins, they should be easy to dispatch, however, they will likely use corruption against you, so I may dispatch some Thralls to assist, provided we can still contain their corruption. 
Once United, Eternally United. 
Your Queen, Alstaea Velarin
The Oulaws Are Stealing Our Maps

My Queen, 
	The Outlaws are doing regular night operations to try and steal our maps locating the Dalgarian ruins. I believe they have been made aware of the corruption they could find there. We must act swiftly before they steal more. 
	I hereby ask for your authorization to attack their nearby camps with the full might of my troops. I believe we must strike them before they manage to gather more shards and use sorcery against us. 
Once United, Eternally United. 
General Geratan

General Geratan, 
	The Archaeologist’s research that you recovered is going to be crucial for the survival of our Kingdom. 
	From my understanding, our Sorcery negation machines use an ancient form of crystal manufactured by the ancient Dalgarian civilization: Prismatic crystals. We must put all our effort in finding prismatic crystals in the Dalgarian ruins. 
	With the rise of Corruption we observe in our Thralls, I fear we won't be able to contain their corruption if it continues.

The Dalgarian Preservation Society warns me that it will get worse. They say that it is inevitable, due to the growing presence in the sky, but that is nonsense. 
	Corruption is on the rise because we haven't dedicated enough effort into fighting it, not because of some heretical Dalgarian beliefs about stars... 
	We need to dedicate all our resources into combating Corruption. We must double, nay, triple our efforts, and ensure the Purity of our lands. 
Once United, Eternally United, 
Your Queen, Alstaea Velarin

Soldiers! 
	Hear this message from Her Majesty Alstaea Velarin, Queen of our beloved Eraden: 
Fellow Pure Hearts! 
	Our pure nation shall suffer no more the invasion of the southern rotten brine, or the eastern foul smells. 
	Our pure nation resisted the influence of corruption for thousands of years against those who practise sorcery. 
	As a direct descendant of king Aldaric the Wise, the Uniter of the First Kingdom, and the first Pure Heart, I will not see what he built destroyed by the greed and selfishness of a few.

Our faith, our love for the Achmenic church commands us to take action against the corruption. We are Eradians, and our hearts shall remain pure! I therefore declare that as of today, we shall wipe out from our land the corruption. 
	I declare the third crusade against Corruption. Following the footsteps of King Aldaric, we will purify Our Land once again! 
	Once United, Eternally United! Once Pure Hearted, Always Pure Hearted!

Soldiers! 
	Hear this message from Her Majesty Alstaea Velarin, Queen of our beloved Eraden: 
Fellow Pure Hearts! 
	We must double our efforts in our fight against the Corrupted. 
	Traitors and those influenced by corruption are infiltrating our ranks. Our spies intercepted a letter of corrupt soldiers selling shards amongst our rank. 
	Justice will be served with extreme discrimination. I do not show any compassion or mercy for traitors. Should you encounter any treasonous activity, report promptly to General Geratan immediately. You will be thanked for your services accordingly. 
	Eraden will not fall to the growing corruption! 
Once United, Eternally United!
A Strike On The Southern Seas

General Geratan, 
	It is time for us to purify our lands once and for all. 
	Our spies reported that the pirate king, Ramayan Yandevo, has begun to lose control of his men. His corruption has grown to a point of no return. The shards have made him lose his mind. Some of his captains defected from his ranks, including Sakaryan Kravano. 
	It is time for us to strike, and regain our control over the southern seas. 
	Organize a strike on their fleet, and send a search party to find Kravano. It is time the Baron pays for battle of Detlaya. 
Once United, Eternally United, 
Your Queen, Alstaea Velarin

My Queen, 
	We have recovered the missing Archaeologist. We have also recovered her research, and while it contains information you will surely find useful, she also shows signs of heresy. 
	It seems that she believes Corruption isn’t evil; that Sorcery is a legitimate tool. 
	I had her imprisoned, awaiting for your orders.

The other members of the Dalgarian Preservation Society that we are guarding reported that the bright star in the sky is getting bigger. 
	They believe this to be linked to the rise of Corruption. I have told their leader, Raein Valentir, that this is not the case, but he insists on getting an audience with you. 
	I don't believe they are to be trusted. I understand their work represents a strategic resource for us, but their approach seems to be increasingly resembling Corruption. 
Once United, Eternally United. 
General Geratan
The Birth Of Aldaric The Wise

Subjects of the Eraden Empire, 
	By decree of Her Majesty, Alstaea Velarin, Queen of Eraden, a holy celebration will be held annually to commemorate the birth of His Majesty, The King, Aldaric The Wise, Unifier of Eraden.
	We shall all remember how His Majesty made us Pure Hearts and unified us under the Achmenic Church. 
	We shall celebrate our victory over the Corruption, and we shall celebrate the Birth of our Unity. May it last until the end of time. This celebration shall be deemed “The Birth Of Purity”.
Once United, Eternally United!

Praise King Aldaric
Founder of Eraden 
First Pure Heart 
Our Guide Against Corruption 
Our Beacon of Unity

The Study Of Our Origins - The First Pure Hearted (1/6) 
	Before the time of King Aldaric, our lands were divided and conflicted. Corruption was everywhere, and sorcerers roamed free. It was a time of great turmoil. A time when the Eradian people started to doubt their beliefs. 
	Not many traces of their beliefs remain, but the Dalgarian Preservation Society put forth extensive effort to gather and maintain all the history we could find. It was immensely useful in my quest to better understand our past.

The Study Of Our Origins - The First Pure Hearted (2/6) 
	What I have learned was that many Eradians of that time were Disciples of the Khemenet

The Study Of Our Origins - The First Pure Hearted (3/6) 
	The Khemenet was believed to be the only one able to wield a powerful Sorcerer's Sword; “The Sword of Naa”. Once found, this mythical weapon would grant them unlimited control over sorcery across the land. 
	Naturally, the most Corrupted among us were the ones to seek the sword, believing themselves to be the Khemenet. This created major conflicts and constant threats in our lands, but this turmoil may have spread across the entire continent.
	At the Dalgarian Preservation Society, we believe this sword to be real, due to numerous Dalgarian scriptures we excavated over the years. For King Aldaric, this Sword was a threat; an artefact of pure evil that would corrupt anyone who touches it.

The Study Of Our Origins - The First Pure Hearted (4/6) 
     His Majesty, King Aldaric, believed the Khemenet to be nothing more than a legend meant to protect the power of the few and maintain injustice over our lands. However, he still believed the sword existed. 
	The sword posed a threat to stability. Corruption could devour the land, and with it would slowly die our pure hearts. King Aldaric, therefore, ordered all documents related to the Disciples of the Khemenet destroyed, as to obscure the legend and location of the sword.

The Study Of Our Origins - The First Pure Hearted (5/6) 
     With this, the likelihood that a Corrupted sorcerer would learn about the legend and seek the sword was very low. And he was surprisingly thorough with wiping out the teachings of the religion, as the Dalgarian Preservation Society so far has no found any documents relating to its location.
	Despite my love for Archaeology, I believe King Aldaric's decision was the right one.

The Study Of Our Origins - The First Pure Hearted (6/6) 
	However, King Aldaric did not stop there. Corruption was everywhere, and needed to be destroyed. 
	Fortunately, this coincided with the discovery of the Sorcery negation devices left by the Dalgarian Society. With those, Sorcerers could finally be fought by the pure hearted. And soon, the battle against Corruption was won. Sorcerers fled our land, and those who stayed are under our control thanks to the devices. 
	King Aldaric deserves his status as the Legend of Eraden. From being its founder to purifying its land, King Aldaric deserves to be celebrated as a saint. 
Raein Valentir, master of the Dalgarian Society

My Queen, 
	We have intercepted this letter from Raein Valentir. 
	I believe with more certainty every day that the Dalgarian Preservation Society is plotting against you. I would have Raein Valentir arrested. 
	What are your orders? 
Once United, Eternally United. 
General Geratan

Efaryn, 
	The Queen has ordered me to write a pamphlet on King Aldaric ...in regard to your knowledge and status amongst the scholars she says. 
	Since she declared the official celebration of his name, things have only gotten worse. I hate myself for having written such level of lies, but we do need the queen's support, at least, financially speaking.

Of course, I could make no mention of the Dalgarian Purge, or the erasure of a whole civilization, the calculated killing of all that carry Sorcery - even children. No. Aldaric is to be considered a hero, not a monster. We should be considering other ways to receive support. Maybe the nations of Rakta or Khar-Tib would regard our research with more respect. 
	Please dispatch an emissary to each nation. I shall hope for a favourable response.

As we celebrate tonight the anniversary of the birth of His Majesty Aldaric The Wise, Let us celebrate the purity of the land of Eraden. 
I shall tell the tale of how we became Pure Hearts, as Corruption knocks once again at our doors. 
Our land was once corrupted; left in ruins by Sorcerers obsessed with power. But it is now a land of Unity, Purity, and Compassion. 
Our compassion has no limit for anyone who lets their Soul be pure.

But we have no mercy for those who chose corruption. 
His Majesty, Aldaric The Wise, freed our land from the corruption thanks to the first and second Crusades.
Those who followed false prophets and false gods, and corrupted the souls of our children had to be cleansed. 
Our King was compassionate enough to grant many the chance to absolve their sin and become Pure Hearts, but only a few did so.
“Once United, Eternally United” are the Pure Hearts, but tragically, “Once Corrupted, Always Corrupted” seems to be true for many others.

Through [emaj6] the harsh [C#m11] winters 
[C#7sus4] Through the [emaj6] blood of our [F#sus4] enemies 
[C3add1] Eraden [C#m7] rise [Bsus4] United! 
[Emaj] Pure Of Heart [C#7sus4] As The First [C#m7] Snow

[Bsus2] Eternally [C#sus4] United! [C#min]

King [Emaj7] Aldaric [F#sus4]
Seeker [F#7] Of Peace [Emaj7] 
Your Name [F#sus4] Shall Be [F#7] Holy! [C#m7] 
A hundred [Emaj7] years [F#min] of Reign [F#sus4] 
The tribes [C#m7] Answered [Emaj7] Your Calling [F#min] 
United we [Amaj] are Once [F#min] A [Bsus4] gain [B7]

- Royal Hunting Order -
	By decree of Her Majesty, Alstaea Velarin, any member of the Eraden military will be rewarded for the kill or capture of the following people: 
Wanted For Piracy: 
	- Ramayan Yandevo; Southern Pirate Leader: 2000 Eradian Gold 
	- Sakaryan "The Baron" Kravano

Dear Elthrean, 
	I feel awful. I was 
	Sold on going up north, but the 
	Whole expedition is terrible. Wet, cold, muddy. I finished the 
	Batch of cookies you gave me. Please 
	Send me more! With the Outlaw activity, this place has become the most uninhabited land I have travelled across... The 
	More time passes, the more I miss our Yltean beaches. 
With all my respect, 
Parean

Dear Parean, 
	I know how you feel. I’ve 
	Received a bunch more cookies from my grandmother. Next time, she will be expecting 
	Payment! Just joking. She is glad you like them. Your 
	Package should arrive to your camp by 
	Next week. I am impressed that the 
	Boat takes so little time to reach the northern lands. Yesterday 
	Marked the first year since I moved to Yltea. It does 
	Cross my mind time to time to go back to the capital. Nothing beats those sunsets. 
With all my respect, 
Elthrean

Dear Elthrean 
	Sales are on! Consider this a deal with your grandmother. 
	Going further, I shall sell her cookies to the whole regiment! This is a 
	Very fitting time, as the winter is getting much worse. 
	Well, some warm fire would arguably be better than sweet treats, but we 
	Must do with what we have. On a sadder note, our casualties have been 
	Double what we’re used to. The Outlaws there are giving us a surprisingly hard time. In any case, I'm asking for full
	Production for your grandmother's cookies! 
With all my respect, 
Parean

Dear Parean, 
	My grandmother will sure be happy to know of your enthusiasm. It is a 
	Source of great joy for her, and it is important at her age and 
	Compromised health. Whatever it is, I 
	Must find ways to keep her busy. That is the only way she will manage to 
	Stop her old age from getting the better of her. I hope her 
	Sales will keep the winter days well. 
With all my respect, 
Elthrean

Dear Elthrean, 
	They love the cookies! Everyone is 
	Looking forward to getting more. 
	For what it's worth, everyone needs a reminder of where they come from, 
	Me included. Your grandmother cookies are delicious, 
	But
	Don't fool yourself, I prefer the ones my own grandmother used to make! I 
	Know that most soldiers could say the same, 
	It's only natural. But as for 
	Me, I will be forever grateful of that little bit of warmth you brought to us. 
With all my respect, 
Parean

Dear Parean, 
	In my mind, I can imagine all those soldiers letting any 
	Trouble be forgotten while eating my grandmother's cookies, and I am grateful for this 
	Too. Here in Yltea life, is 
	Barely the same without you. It's like you 
	Escaped from my reality. When will we 
	Meet again? If if was up to 
	Me, I would join you up North, 
	At my old friend's village, 
	Denando town. Maybe you could actually visit him and say hi! 
With all my respect, 
Elthrean

General Geratan, 
	A major shard trafficking network was uncovered in Yltea. Our spy network arrested a few traffickers who were fleeing the city. 
	During questioning, one of the traffickers revealed he has been in contact with one of your soldiers currently fighting in the northern campaign. He died during questioning, but we managed to extract some information; This soldier is selling shards in our rank. 
	We did not manage to figure out their name, but we know they have been contacting each other via coded messages in their letters.

Find them and execute them publicly. Before you do, however, do not forget to extract the names of soldiers who have been corrupted by their shards. They shall all be hanged and their bodies displayed in front of the camps as a warning sign. 
	Eraden does not take treason lightly, let this be known. 
Once United, Eternally United, 
Queen Alstaea Velarin

General, 
	We both know you do not benefit from having me captured, and we both know why. 
	Have me captured, and I'll reveal your little secret to everyone. I have a letter with compromising evidence ready to be sent to your Queen. Help me escape, and I will make sure everything goes your way, and that your receive what you need when you need it. 
	Provide me with a safe passage to Denando, and a seaworthy boat on the coast there. I will contact you again when I reach my destination. 
P.L.

General, 
	Our agreement stands. Close an eye to the boat shipment, and I will keep our secret to myself, plus ten Achmenet Amulets to you, and one to each of your lieutenants. It is my understanding that they are quite valued where you operate. 
	You know where to contact me. 
P.L.

By order of the Queen
	The Crown has been made aware that Corruption has infiltrated our ranks. With the heretical terrorists of the Eye on one side, and the brutal attacks of the Wildfolk on the other, and even the piracy spreading poison within our rank, in our Pure Souls and Hearts, and in our sacred Unity. 
	The Crown knows how much burden is put on the honest Pure Hearts of our ranks. Anyone with information that would help the crown rid the corruption and cleanse the rank of the army will be rewarded with 3 gold coins. 
Once United, Eternally United

My Queen, 
	The rise of Corruption is reaching new heights. A rogue sorcerer, seemingly more powerful each day, is killing my men stationed at outposts in the area. They are, no doubt, after the location of Dalgarian ruins. 
	It seems that some forces are at play to bring back the old faith; To let the corruption take over. 
	They must be stopped at once. 
Once United, Eternally United 
General Geratan

My Queen, 
	The soldiers are worried about the Dalgarian Preservation Society. While we are tasked to assist and protect them, there are more signs every day that they may be agents of the corruption. 
	I must reiterate my concern towards them. My troop do not feel comfortable around them. 
Once United, Eternally United, 
General Geratan

3rd Day of the Purification Campaign 
	General Geratan said we were close to a deployment. I honestly cannot wait. The horror I have seen on our way makes me want to kill every Eye Sorcerers until the last. 
	Heard from a few scared villagers about people kidnapped, and found later deformed beyond recognition... dead. I have seen families burned alive in their homes. I have seen children with every one of their bones broken. 
	They are monsters. Seems they kill all those that are Pure Hearts, leaving only those that have some Corruption in them alive. 
	We all have a little. No hiding that fact, but why kill the innocent? And just how do they recognize them? 
	Well, I am but a soldier. I am not to ask questions. Just need to keep these people safe.

5th Day of the Purification Campaign 
	Woke up to a nightmare of Corruption. Those sorcerers ambushed our camp, throwing fireballs and purple coloured sorceries that tore men apart right before my eyes. 
	Lost a dear friend, Eryatel. The poor lad, I don't know what they did to him, but he had blood dripping from all his orifices.
